channel.title: Multiplayer: invisible weapons on spawn & gauss shooting
channel.description:
Hello. Sometimes, when spawning after dying, I can't see any weapon model (whatever weapon I pick up or change through the inventory). So I'm just running and shooting with nothing in my hands (actually, with no hands at all). It fixes itself when I die and spawn again, but that happens quite often. P.S. The same glitch happens in HL2DM, but only with a shotgun, and changing weapons fixed that. The devs never fixed that, though. I hope you will. :slight_smile:
Oh, and one more thing! When a player shoot with gauss, the laser shoots from his head and not from the weapon! Looks terrible :smiley:

item.title: Multiplayer: invisible weapons on spawn & gauss shooting
item.dc:creator: gtamike
item.description:
LordDz:

Because it’s a temporary fix, not a good solution to the problem.

Indeed has to be activated multiple times but better than nothing.
Here’s a Video of the [Fix] in Action
youtube.com/watch?v=c93IHceoDsg

Read full topic
